#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

 inline long long int fast_input(void)
{
	char t;
	long long int x=0;
	long long int neg=0;
	t=getchar();
	while((t<48 || t>57) && t!='-')
		t=getchar();
	if(t=='-')
		{neg=1; t=getchar();}
    while(t>=48 && t<=57)
    {
        x=(x<<3)+(x<<1)+t-48;
        t=getchar();
    }
	if(neg)
		x=-x;
	return x;
}
  
inline void fast_output(long long int x, int mode)
{
	char a[20];
	long long int i=0,j;
	a[0]='0';
	if (x<0) {putchar('-'); x=-x;}
	if (x==0) putchar('0');
	while(x)
	{
		a[i++]=x%10+48;
		x/=10;
	}
	for(j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
	{
		putchar(a[j]);
	}
	if (mode==0) putchar('\n');
    else putchar(' ');
}
long long int ncr[501][501];

int main()
{   long long int t;
    t = fast_input();
    
    
    ncr[0][0]=1;
    ncr[0][1]=0;
    
    for(int j = 0; j<= 500; j++)
    {
        ncr[j][0]=1;
    }
    
    for(int i = 1; i<= 500; i++)
    {
        for(int j = i; j<= 500; j++)
        {
            ncr[j][i] = ncr[j-1][i-1] + ncr[j-1][i]; 
            ncr[j][i] = ncr[j][i]%1000000007;
        }
    }
    
    
    while(t--)
    {long long int n,l,h;
    n = fast_input();
    l = fast_input();
    h = fast_input();
    long long int ans = 0;
    for(int i = l; i<= h; i++)
    {
        ans = (ans+ncr[n-1][i-1])%1000000007;
        
    }
        fast_output(ans,0);
    }
    
return 0;
    
}
